name: There Is No Pause Button in Unity
name_original: There Is No Pause Button in Unity
description:
This is a project I have been trying to develop for a very long time, and I am super happy that I have been able to complete it, FINALLY!

If you're new to this game, it's a remake of Scott Cawthon's "There Is No Pause Button" game on Android/iOS (basically mobile game). Although, Scott used this game as a troll game for Five Nights at Freddy's 3.

I have used the same music from that troll game but mixed it with the original There Is No Pause Button game.

Unfortunately, there are only 20 levels and the original game has 30 levels, which is why I said it's an *ALMOST* remake of the original!

Bare in mind, the points system doesn't change depending on how well you do. The points system is just there because the original had the points system. The reason why I remade this game is because I wanted to see if I could and I did, so now you guys can just have fun with the game and not worry about the points system because that's not the priority of the game.

This version of the game, however, is slightly different. If you dare try this one out? This one doesn't have the points system, but it has something..... else....

*Link not available yet*
